text: aur logon mein se kuchh aise bhee hain jo ek kinaare par (khade hokar) khuda kee ibaadat karata hai to agar usako koee phaayada pahunch gaya to usakee vajah se mutameen ho gaya aur agar kaheen us koee museebat chhoo bhee gayee to (phauran) munh pher ke (kufr kee taraf) palat pada usane duniya aur aakherat (donon) ka ghaata uthaaya yahee to sareehee ghaata hai
